meanings.definition: A stick or cane used for walking.
meanings.sent1: Grandpa leaned on his walkingsticks as he strolled in the park.
meanings.sent2: She bought a new walkingstick to help her hike up the mountain.
meanings.sent3: The walkingsticks decided to take a break and leaned against a tree.
meanings.sent4: The walkingsticks stood tall like guardians of the forest.
meanings.sent5: The old man's walkingsticks clicked rhythmically on the pavement.

meanings.definition: Insects of the family Phasmatidae, resembling sticks or twigs.
meanings.sent1: The walkingsticks camouflaged perfectly among the branches.
meanings.sent2: She was amazed to see walkingsticks that looked just like twigs.
meanings.sent3: The walkingsticks had a family reunion on the tree branch.
meanings.sent4: The walkingsticks seemed to be playing a game of hide-and-seek with the birds.
meanings.sent5: The walkingsticks swayed gently in the breeze, blending in with the forest.
